answers.answer: Girl I feel you. I had nothing bad until I developed preeclampsia at the end last time. This time I've had mouth ulcers that filled my whole mouth I've had sciatic nerves problems. Charlie horses and she's been weighing on my pelvis since 30 weeks. Nobody understands it wasn't normal for me since I didn't have that last time

I understand.  I have been throwing up almost daily since 6 weeks pregnant. I am now 35 weeks.  My stomach is very weak from acid reflux.  My legs jump a lot at night.  I have to use the restroom at night every two hours. This pregnancy is totally different from my first one.

I know my first (boy) was easy had some morning sickness but with this second babe its like she has been reading a pregnancy manaul and are giving me everything. I had morning sickness so bad for like 7 mnths, bloody noses,terrible eye infection (apparently from the vomit) , pelvic pressure so bad I was is hospital overnight, can't really eat or drink, heart burn, head ache, leg cramps basically everything. Can't wait till Nov for my little Aimee to make her grand appearance.

Definitely understand! Cleaned out my friends as well when I quit drinking once I was pregnant. I'm having a boy this time and this pregnancy is WAY different than my first and by far the hardest. I'm going to be 35 weeks Monday and I am so ready to be done lol on be rest now so I'm getting a little stir crazy and I have that stupid pregnancy gingivitis too. Keep your head up!!!

I knew you ladies would understand, I don't think I've pee'd so much before and yeah this one just sits on my bladder too.. and the acid reflux for me only happens when I go to bed :(I joke with my husband and say we already have a little diva on our hands!Just a few weeks left! :)

I thought the weird bladder issues I had the first time around were bad. Now, I'm literally having an allergic reaction to pregnancy. Covered in hives. Ugh. Don't think in going to be making it to October!

question: So I feel like with this pregnancy EVERYTHING is so different from my first (boy).. I feel like with this one EVERYTHING is happening.. I had really bad nausea at the beginning, VERY emotional, gestational diabetes, pregnancy gingivitis, mouth ulcers (which I never heard of, but apparently is completely normal during pregnancy)..I just feel like I can hardly deal with it anymore.. I am ready to have my body back and meet our little girl.. I'm sorry for venting, I vent to my husband and he pretends to understand which I love him for but he doesn't get it at all.. & I don't have many friends because I cleaned my life out. So I figure why not where people actually understand.Thanks ladies..
title: Just venting..
